function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Correlation analysis between air pollution and COVID-19 variables","Impact":"Identifying potential influence of outliers and skewness of data can impact the accuracy of the analysis.","Mitigation":"Use robust statistical methods to handle skewed data and outliers, and consider sensitivity analysis to assess the impact of outliers.","Technologies":"Robust statistical methods, sensitivity analysis","People":"Data analysts, statisticians","Owner":"Data analysis team"},{"Description":"Geospatial mapping and visualization of COVID-19 and air pollution","Impact":"Misinterpretation of the thematic maps can lead to inaccurate assessments of the relationship between COVID-19 and air pollution.","Mitigation":"Provide clear legends and context for the thematic maps, and validate the accuracy of the mapping data.","Technologies":"Geospatial mapping software, accuracy validation tools","People":"Geospatial analysts, public health experts","Owner":"Geospatial analysis team"},{"Description":"High viral infections in areas with air pollutants","Impact":"Increased health risks and potential for disease transmission in areas with high air pollution.","Mitigation":"Implement measures to reduce air pollution, improve ventilation, and promote public health awareness in highly affected areas.","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems, pollution control technologies","People":"Public health organizations, environmental agencies","Owner":"Local and national governments"}]}
